name: Air-IT
tagline: An IT Support Company in Nottingham.
description: We're the East Midland’s No.1 Managed Service Provider, delivering award winning IT and communications services to SMEs across the region and nationwide. We're a trusted ICT partner for over 400 clients, who range in size from local SMBs to enterprises across diverse market sectors. We offer a wide range of outsourced services, tailored to a clients’ individual needs - helping them to achieve success through their IT, communications and connectivity.

locations.address: Unit 7, Interchange 25 Business Park, Bostocks Lane, Sandiacre
